item.title: 苹果公司支持 5000 万美元基金支持湾区经济适用房建设
item.description: 苹果公司正与房地产公司 Sobrato 的慈善部门以及另外两个位于加利福尼亚州的团体合作，发起一项基金，首期投资 5000 万美元，用于支持旧金山湾区的经济适用房项目。【原文：Apple is partnering with the philanthropic arm of real estate firm Sobrato and two other California-based groups to launch a fund with an initial investment of $50 million to support affordable housing projects in the San Francisco Bay Area.】

item.title: 北方信托因手续费收入增加和会计收益而利润大增
item.description: 资产与财富管理公司北方信托（Northern Trust）周三公布的第二季度利润增长了两倍多，这主要得益于较高的手续费收入，以及与 Visa 公司的股票交易带来的 8.784 亿美元的会计收益。【原文：Asset and wealth manager Northern Trust posted a more than two-fold jump in second-quarter profit on Wednesday, thanks to higher fee income and an accounting gain of $878.4 million from a stock exchange deal with Visa .】

item.title: 芯片股因担心美国收紧对华销售限制而暴跌
item.description: 周三收盘前，芯片制造商的股价下跌了4%以上，原因是有报道称可能会加强对主要市场中国的先进技术供应限制，以及共和党总统提名人唐纳德-特朗普对台湾的评论。【原文：Shares of chipmakers fell more than 4% before the bell on Wednesday amid reports of possible tighter restrictions on supply of advanced technology to key market China and comments on Taiwan from Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump.】

item.title: 世贸组织称中国工业扶持计划缺乏透明度
item.description: 世界贸易组织周三表示，由于 "整体缺乏透明度"，该组织无法清楚地了解中国对电动汽车或铝和钢铁生产等关键工业部门的财政支持。【原文：The World Trade Organization said on Wednesday that it was unable to get a clear picture of China's financial support for key industrial sectors, such as electric vehicles or aluminium and steel production due to an "overall lack of transparency".】

item.title: 梅赛德斯-奔驰公司与星巴克合作在美国建立快速充电站
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰公司周三表示，该公司已与星巴克合作，在全美 100 多个地点部署其快速充电站。【原文：A Mercedes-Benz unit said on Wednesday it had partnered with Starbucks to deploy its fast-charging stations at more than 100 locations across the United States.】

item.title: 存款成本影响利息收入，美国合众银行调整后利润下降
item.description: 本周三，美国合众银行（U.S. Bancorp）第二季度调整后利润下降约 10%，原因是存款成本上升和贷款需求低迷导致利息收入下降。【原文：U.S. Bancorp's adjusted profit fell about 10% in the second quarter on Wednesday, hurt by a decline in interest income due to higher deposit costs and muted loan demand.】

item.title: 资本市场强劲，公民金融公司利润超出预期
item.description: Citizens Financial 周三公布的第二季度利润超出预期，原因是强劲的资本市场缓解了贷款疲软带来的冲击。【原文：Citizens Financial beat expectations for second-quarter profit on Wednesday, as strong capital markets softened the hit from weaker lending.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：美联储主席威廉姆斯暗示未来数月有必要降息
item.description: 纽约联储主席约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）在周三发表的一篇访谈中表示，美联储正 "越来越接近 "可以开始降息的时刻，但在七月会议之前将缺乏足够的数据来确认通胀率正在可持续地回到2%的水平。【原文：The Federal Reserve is "getting closer" to a point where it can start cutting interest rates but will lack sufficient data before its July meeting to confirm inflation is on a sustainable path back to 2%, New York Fed President John Williams said in an interview published on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英镑驶入快车道需要的不仅仅是更高的英国利率
item.description: 英镑周三创下一年来的最高点，原因是全球利率开始下降，投资者争相寻求更丰厚的回报，但策略师们表示，英镑要想保持这种光芒，需要的不仅仅是更高的利率。【原文：The pound hit its highest in a year on Wednesday, driven by investors who are scrambling for juicier returns as global interest rates start to fall, but strategists say it will take more than higher rates for sterling to retain that sparkle.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉大米和玉米产量增加，因为买家向农民贷款供应
item.description: 在委内瑞拉西部波图格萨州，罗伯托-拉蒂尼（Roberto Latini）种植的 300 多公顷（740 英亩）青翠的玉米和水稻在艳阳和蓝天下起伏。【原文：More than 300 hectares (740 acres) of verdant corn and rice planted by Roberto Latini in the western Venezuelan state of Portuguesa undulate under a bright sun and blue sky.】

item.title: 价格降温导致美国玉米带小麦种植面积减少
item.description: 乌克兰战争爆发后，拜登政府推动增加美国小麦种植面积的努力举步维艰，因为小麦价格徘徊在四年来的低点附近，而黑海地区的可出口供应持续流入，抑制了对美国谷物的需求。【原文：A Biden administration drive to increase U.S. wheat plantings after the Ukraine war is faltering as wheat prices hover around four-year lows and exportable supplies continue to flow from the Black Sea region, curbing demand for American grain.】

item.title: 药品销售强劲，J&J业绩超出华尔街预期
item.description: 受癌症治疗药物 Darzalex 和银屑病治疗药物 Stelara 等药品销售强劲的推动，强生公司周三公布的第二季度利润和收入均超出预期。【原文：Johnson & Johnson beat estimates for second-quarter profit and revenue on Wednesday, driven by strong sales of its drugs, including cancer treatment Darzalex and blockbuster psoriasis drug Stelara.】

item.title: 医疗成本低于预期，Elevance 盈利超出预期
item.description: 本周三，Elevance Health 的季度利润超过了华尔街的预期，因为这家医疗保险公司在会员医疗费用上的支出低于预期。【原文：Elevance Health beat Wall Street estimates for quarterly profit on Wednesday, as the health insurer spent less than expected on the medical costs of its members.】

item.title: 科技股下滑，华尔街期货反弹后下滑
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货下滑，其中纳斯达克 100 指数期货跌幅超过 1%，原因是投资者抛售了巨型科技股和芯片股，并涌入小盘股等市场滞后领域。【原文：U.S. stock index futures slid on Wednesday, with those tracking the Nasdaq 100 dropping over 1% as investors sold off megacap tech and chip shares and piled into lagging areas of the market such as small-cap stocks.】

item.title: 用户增长放缓，Netflix努力增加广告层级成为焦点
item.description: 4-6 月份，Netflix 的新增用户数量可能是五个季度以来最少的，原因是打击密码共享后的大幅增长逐渐减弱，观众的注意力转移到了夏季体育赛事上，包括欧洲足球锦标赛。【原文：Netflix likely added the fewest number of subscribers in five quarters during April-June as sharp gains following a crackdown on password sharing ebbed and viewer attention moved to summer sporting events including the Euro soccer tournament.】

item.title: 美国许多太阳能工厂都处于落后状态。中国拥有的除外
item.description: 中国公司在美国建造太阳能制造厂的数量激增，使中国在这一新兴产业中占据了主导地位，而其他美国工厂尽管有联邦补贴，却在竞争中举步维艰。【原文：Construction of U.S. solar-manufacturing plants by Chinese companies is surging, putting China in position to dominate the nascent industry, as other American factories struggle to compete despite federal subsidies.】

item.title: 独家报道：海湾国家阿联酋考虑建造第二座核电站
item.description: 一位政府官员告诉路透社，阿拉伯联合酋长国正在考虑建造第二座核电站，以满足这个石油资源丰富的海湾国家日益增长的电力需求。【原文：The United Arab Emirates is considering building a second nuclear power plant to meet growing demand for electricity in the oil-rich Gulf state, a government official told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国的中资太阳能工厂
item.description: 由于美国总统乔-拜登的《2022 年通货膨胀削减法案》中包含了新的清洁能源生产补贴，一些最大的中国太阳能电池板制造商正在美国建立工厂。【原文：Some of the largest Chinese solar panel makers are setting up shop in the United States thanks to new clean energy manufacturing subsidies contained in President Joe Biden's 2022 Inflation Reduction Act.】

item.title: 美国太阳能电池板制造商寻求更严格的 "美国制造 "规则
item.description: 一个美国太阳能制造商团体呼吁拜登政府收紧对使用国产组件的太阳能项目开发商的税收抵免规定，称他们可以在不使用美国太阳能电池板的情况下获得抵免。【原文：A group of U.S. solar manufacturers is calling on the Biden administration to toughen rules governing a tax credit for solar project developers that use domestically produced components, saying they can get the credit without using American solar panels.】

item.title: 早间竞价：小盘股在补涨轮动中飙升，特朗普抨击台湾
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 独家报道Capital One 承诺提供 2,650 亿美元的贷款和慈善资金，努力达成 Discover 交易
item.description: Capital One 银行周三表示，如果收购发现金融服务公司（Discover Financial Services）的交易获得通过，该公司将在五年内投入 2,650 亿美元用于贷款、慈善事业和投资，以安抚批评者并赢得监管机构的青睐。【原文：Capital One will commit $265 billion over five years to lending, philanthropy and investment if its takeover of Discover Financial Services goes through, the bank said on Wednesday, as it aims to appease critics and win over regulators.】

item.title: 工会称波音西雅图工厂工人将在罢工制裁投票中发出 "强烈信息
item.description: 波音公司华盛顿州工厂的工人将于周三投票决定是否授权工会举行罢工，因为他们在 16 年来与波音公司的首次全面谈判中寻求加薪 40%。【原文：Boeing's Washington state factory workers will vote on Wednesday on whether to give their union a strike mandate as they seek a 40% raise in their first full negotiation with the planemaker in 16 years.】

item.title: 聚焦：波音舱门爆炸危机重创供应商、航空公司和乘客
item.description: 今年 1 月，阿拉斯加航空公司一架波音 737 MAX 9 飞机的门板在半空中爆炸，Anneke Palmerton 得知航空公司也取消了她飞往奥兰多的航班。【原文：After a door panel on an Alaska Airlines-operated Boeing 737 MAX 9 jet blew off midair in January, Anneke Palmerton learned the carrier had canceled her flight to Orlando as well.】

item.title: 摩根大通戴蒙：美联储应耐心等待下一步行动
item.description: 摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）周三在接受媒体采访时表示，美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）在下一次利率行动中应保持耐心，以考虑到在动荡的世界中通胀再次上升的可能性。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve should exercise patience with its next interest rate move to account for the chance of inflation rising again in a turbulent world, JP Morgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon said in a media interview published on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称，宝马因安全气囊气体发生器问题在美国召回 1100 多辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周三表示，宝马汽车公司将在美国召回1145辆汽车，原因是一个潜在的问题可能导致驾驶员一侧的安全气囊在展开时爆炸。【原文：BMW is recalling 1,145 vehicles in the United States over a potential issue that may cause the airbag on the driver's side to explode during deployment, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Fortescue 公司将裁员约 700 人；任命内部人士 Apple Paget 担任首席财务官
item.description: 澳大利亚矿业公司 Fortescue 周三表示，将在新一轮重组中裁员约 700 人，占其全球员工总数的 4.5%，同时任命代理首席财务官 Apple Paget 为集团永久财务总监。【原文：Fortescue will reduce about 700 jobs, or 4.5% of its global workforce, in a fresh restructuring round, the Australian miner said on Wednesday, as it appointed acting Chief Financial Officer Apple Paget as its permanent group finance chief.】

item.title: 英国国家统计局称，截至 5 月的 12 个月内，英国房价上涨了 2.2
item.description: 英国国家统计局（Office for National Statistics）周三表示，英国房价继4月份上涨1.3%之后，5月份连续第三个月上涨，年涨幅为2.2%。【原文：British house prices rose for a third month in a row in May, increasing by an annual 2.2% after a 1.3% rise in April, the Office for National Statistics said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 亚马逊称，英国工会在投票失败后未能赢得亚马逊网站的认可
item.description: 亚马逊周三表示，GMB 工会未能获得正式代表位于英格兰中部考文垂的亚马逊仓库工人的权利。【原文：The GMB union has failed to secure the right to formally represent workers at an Amazon warehouse in Coventry, central England, Amazon said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 垃圾时间中国经济衰退催生经济绝望新模式
item.description: 中国经济的萎靡不振在网上引发了一种新的悲观情绪，即对就业、收入和机会出现任何转机的前景感到悲观："历史的垃圾时期"。【原文：China’s sputtering economy has prompted a dire, new shorthand online for pessimism about the prospects for any turnaround for jobs, incomes and opportunity: “the garbage time of history.”】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Domino's 因在日本和法国关闭门店而增长平平
item.description: 澳大利亚多米诺比萨企业周三表示，预计本财年门店增长将持平或略有增长，并决定在日本关闭多达80家低销量门店，在法国关闭10-20家门店。【原文：Australia's Domino's Pizza Enterprises said on Wednesday it expects store growth to be flat to slightly positive in its current fiscal year, and decided to close up to 80 low-volume stores in Japan and 10-20 stores in France.】
